about_the_game:
In the world of steampunk, where exists scientific and magical energy, the ancient ruins “Sky Castle” left in the mythological era are circulated.
The Goblin and the Ratkin, who pursue the various secret treasures for living, come to the Sky Castle by airships and battle for it. Because of the similar strength, they reached a stalemate then employ the magicians (players) to occupy the city.
Players need teamwork and tactics to get the victory.

　　☆Condition for Victory: Destroy the opponent’s main tower.
InfinityVR is a magical shooting and multiplayer online battle arena game in virtual reality.
Currently it contains two classes: Archer and Guard, there will be more interesting classes added and players can choose their favorite character to fight together with their teammates.
Through different tactical design and skill matching, such as somatosensory shooting, block, archer skill, area magic, map skills or guard teammates to achieve victory conditions.

1.Support Robot.
2.Eight optional characters and free to choose the factions and the birth/ resurrection position.
3.Built-in skills: somatosensory shooting, block, archer skill, area magic, map skills.
4.Multiple classes are waiting for you to experience. (Archers who proficient in attacking, guards who are good at guarding teammates, etc.)
5.Players who good at use skills can even be unscathed in group battles.
6.Designed movement and easy-to-understand operation reduce the burden on the player in the game.
